messages.message: Hi team, I had a call with a commercial customer (Expatrio) and they had feedback around accuracy testing/metrics. What they want to achieve is for each application version they're about to roll out, they want a document level STP rate (e.g. X% of the 50 documents they tested will be automated with this version of the app). I don't think they can do this currently. With our emphasis on STP rate with DocAI, I do think that accuracy tests and deployment metrics should be updated to reflect this focus (document level metrics as well as field level metrics)
@david.lee we’re going to chat about the accuracy tests in the GAP analysis today - would you be happy to talk through some of this story in that session too? CC @Venkatesh
oh wait don’t worry it’ll be way late for you
already spoke with @Atul Grover about it!
Okay no worries - if you are able to join then excellent, otherwise @Atul Grover and I can bring it up
